main event: A peculiar object was observed hovering in the sky over Winnsboro, Texas on August 27, 1952, and then suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes,The object was described as strange with no determined source,There was mention of a witness living nearby who also reported seeing a bright object,The conditions of the sky were clear at the time of observation,The witness was an aircraft mechanic and had prior experience observing aerial objects.
witness description: Male, aged 70, previously an aircraft mechanic
